reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits beautifully and is comfortable, with one mentioning it sucks everything in without being too tight. They appreciate its style, with one noting it can be dressed up for dinner out, and they like the shapewear feature, with one describing it as a genius addition. The dress receives positive feedback for its quality, with one mentioning it's perfect for a night out in Vegas, and customers like its size, with one noting it makes them look at least a size smaller. The material quality receives mixed reviews, and several customers find it difficult to get on. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!!!
items.body: This dress is amazing. Beautiful!!! Material is great. True to size. Very comfy!!! Read more
items.author: MJ Colon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and sexy
items.body: Perfect dress. Hold on perfect in all the right places. Nice looking Read more
items.author: Nicole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress for night out in Vegas
items.body: Love this dress. It is a bit of a challenge to put on but once it’s on, it fits like a glove. The shapewear sucks everything in and the dress is still very comfortable. For someone that has had two kids via c-section, this dress works miracles (IYKYK). I highly recommend this dress. Read more
items.author: Melissa I

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dirty Dress
items.body: The dress I received was used and had multiple stains on the outside of the dress, and also had deodorant stains on the inside of dress. I’m confused as to why I was shipped a used item? I paid 90 dollars for a stained used dress.. Read more
items.author: Alyssa J.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Made in China
items.body: Item description lists that dress was made in America Samoa. But when the dress arrived, the tag on the actual Garment says made in China. I don't know why there's dishonesty in the listing, because the dress is actually very well made, and the size charts provided are very accurate. For reference, I'm usually a US Adult Large, and I had to size up to 2XL. If you know your measurements, follow the size chart and make sure you order the size that will most likely fit you the best. Fabric is nice and thick and I love that there's shape wear built in. Read more
items.author: Incognito

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous but size up
items.body: This dress is gorgeous and gives your body a great shape. Definitely size up. It’s beautiful. Read more
items.author: Kerri H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must staple piece
items.body: This brand dress comes in several different styles. It is kind of difficult to get into. But once you do you look great. It’s a fantastic staple piece and could be layered with jackets, etc. looks very professional or you can dress it up for dinner out. Read more
items.author: Angela Matlock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
items.body: I feel really cute in this dress. It holds everything in and makes me look at least a size smaller. Worth the money. Read more
items.author: Rachel L Nicholson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Bodycon Long Sleeve Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Bodycon Long Sleeve Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
